function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through shared article downloads and access to online library resources.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Divergence in opinions of different groups of experts","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Convergence without consensus","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of the expert-led approach for selection and identification","category":"Competitiveness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survey participants with less than 3 years of experience may lack the necessary expertise to provide accurate and reliable opinions and suggestions.","category":"Competitiveness","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inconsistent opinions and suggestions due to varying levels of experience among the participants.","category":"Competitiveness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of bias towards the opinions and suggestions of participants with longer experience, leading to the neglect of valuable input from less experienced participants.","category":"Competitiveness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accumulated weighting analysis process involving 25 participants from each field","category":"Performance (equity, resilience, self-sufficiency)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participant engagement conducted online may introduce bias in the selection and recommendation stages.","category":"Performance (equity, resilience, self-sufficiency)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on industry suggestions over scholarly research","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of a closed facebook group for educational purposes","category":"Education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 with millions infected from over 185 countries/regions.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High mortality rate with over 200,000 deceased from covid-19.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global circulation of sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious transmission of the novel sars-cov-2 coronavirus from animal species to humans","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Recombination events in bat and pangolin-origin coronaviruses leading to the generation of new recombinants","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for mutations and evolution of the sars-cov-2 virus in human and animal hosts","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic and flu-like symptoms of sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge on procedures to prevent the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission through droplets, aerosols, and direct contact","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission through direct or indirect contact with infected people or contaminated surfaces","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about the vital concentration of sars-cov-2 necessary to infect a human from inanimate surfaces","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate screening protocols and guidelines for covid-19 testing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of experimental and unapproved drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate evaluation of drugs for covid-19 therapy","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with quarantine and surveillance measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trips to and from ’red’ areas with confirmed covid-19 cases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Selective control and measurement of body temperature","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close contacts between work colleagues or other staff","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper hand washing leading to transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Touching of eyes, nose, mouth, and genitals with unwashed hands","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper sneezing and coughing hygiene","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper use of gloves","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective use of filter masks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of inappropriate face masks in environments potentially contaminated with sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper ppe removal leading to recontamination of clothes and hands","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accelerated climate change leading to increased burden and social unrest","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Role of cities in creating the climate crisis","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 pandemic on climate crisis mitigation efforts","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift from anthropocentric worldview to ecological worldview","category":"Culture/Diversity","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Accelerated spread of contagious diseases from global travel and urbanization","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Growing nationalism and self-interest shown by countries and states competing for medical supplies","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Anthropocentric worldview and human-centered value system","category":"Culture/Diversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Entrenched cartesian-newtonian mechanistic scientific paradigm","category":"Culture/Diversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased competition for resources in a destabilized world","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Anthropocentric worldview and its impact on disease transmission","category":"Culture/Diversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misunderstanding or misinterpretation of indigenous knowledge and practices","category":"Culture/Diversity","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disregard for the interconnectedness of the living and inanimate world","category":"Culture/Diversity","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Imposition of western conceptions of land ownership and property rights","category":"Culture/Diversity","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
